spec.description: Advanced dashboard for visualizing performance KPI results from the k6.io load testing tool, using the InfluxDB 1.x OSS exporter

targets.query:
SELECT max("value") 
FROM "http_req_duration" 
WHERE $timeFilter 
GROUP BY "name"

SELECT max("value")
FROM "ws_duration"
WHERE $timeFilter
GROUP BY "name"
SELECT sum("value") * 1000 / $__interval_ms FROM "vus" WHERE $timeFilter GROUP BY time($__interval) fill(null)
SELECT sum("value") FROM "http_reqs" WHERE $timeFilter GROUP BY time(1s) fill(null)
SELECT sum("value") FROM "http_reqs" WHERE $timeFilter GROUP BY time(1m) fill(null)
SELECT count("value") FROM http_req_duration WHERE $timeFilter
SELECT percentile("value", 50) FROM http_req_duration WHERE $timeFilter
SELECT percentile("value", 80) FROM http_req_duration WHERE $timeFilter
SELECT percentile("value", 90) FROM http_req_duration WHERE $timeFilter
SELECT percentile("value", 95) FROM http_req_duration WHERE $timeFilter
SELECT min("value") FROM http_req_duration WHERE $timeFilter
SELECT mean("value") FROM http_req_duration WHERE $timeFilter
SELECT max("value") FROM http_req_duration WHERE $timeFilter
SELECT count("value") FROM ws_duration WHERE $timeFilter
SELECT percentile("value", 50) FROM ws_duration WHERE $timeFilter
SELECT percentile("value", 80) FROM ws_duration WHERE $timeFilter
SELECT percentile("value", 90) FROM ws_duration WHERE $timeFilter
SELECT percentile("value", 95) FROM ws_duration WHERE $timeFilter
SELECT min("value") FROM ws_duration WHERE $timeFilter
SELECT mean("value") FROM ws_duration WHERE $timeFilter
SELECT max("value") FROM ws_duration WHERE $timeFilter
SELECT sum("value") FROM "checks" WHERE $timeFilter GROUP BY time(1s), "check" fill(none)

SELECT sum("value") AS Error_Count 
FROM "http_reqs" 
WHERE ("status" != '200' AND "status" != '201' AND "status" != '202' AND "status" != '204') AND $timeFilter

SELECT sum("value") AS Pass_Count 
FROM "http_reqs" 
WHERE ("status" = '200' OR "status" = '201' OR "status" = '202' OR "status" = '204') AND $timeFilter
SELECT count("value") FROM "http_reqs" WHERE ("expected_response" = 'false') AND $timeFilter GROUP BY time(1s) fill(none)

SELECT sum("value") AS Error_Count 
FROM "http_reqs" 
WHERE ("status" != '200' AND "status" != '201' AND "status" != '202' AND "status" != '204') AND $timeFilter 
GROUP BY "name"

SELECT sum("value") AS Pass_Count 
FROM "http_reqs" 
WHERE ("status" = '200' OR "status" = '201' OR "status" = '202' OR "status" = '204') AND $timeFilter 
GROUP BY "name"

SELECT sum("value") AS Error_Count  
FROM "ws_failures" 
WHERE $timeFilter 
GROUP BY "name"

SELECT sum("value") AS Pass_Count
FROM "ws_connections"
WHERE $timeFilter
GROUP BY "name"
SELECT sum("value") FROM "http_reqs" WHERE ("status" != '200' AND "status" != '201' AND "status" != '202' AND "status" != '204' ) AND $timeFilter group by status, method, "name"

SELECT sum("value")
FROM "ws_failures"
WHERE $timeFilter
GROUP BY "status", "method", "name"
SELECT max("value") FROM /^$Measurement$/ WHERE ("name" =~ /^$URL$/) AND $timeFilter AND value > 0 GROUP BY time($__interval) fill(null)
SELECT percentile("value", 95) FROM /^$Measurement$/ WHERE ("name" =~ /^$URL$/) AND $timeFilter AND value > 0 GROUP BY time($__interval) fill(null)
SELECT percentile("value", 90) FROM /^$Measurement$/ WHERE ("name" =~ /^$URL$/) AND $timeFilter AND value > 0 GROUP BY time($__interval) fill(null)
SELECT percentile("value", 80) FROM /^$Measurement$/ WHERE ("name" =~ /^$URL$/) AND $timeFilter AND value > 0 GROUP BY time($__interval) fill(null)
SELECT percentile("value", 50) FROM /^$Measurement$/ WHERE ("name" =~ /^$URL$/) AND $timeFilter AND value > 0 GROUP BY time($__interval) fill(null)
SELECT mean("value") FROM /^$Measurement$/ WHERE ("name" =~ /^$URL$/) AND $timeFilter AND value > 0 GROUP BY time($__interval) fill(null)
SELECT min("value") FROM /^$Measurement$/ WHERE ("name" =~ /^$URL$/) AND $timeFilter AND value > 0 GROUP BY time($__interval) fill(null)

SELECT count("value"), percentile("value", 50), percentile("value", 80), percentile("value", 90), percentile("value", 95), Min("value"), Mean("value"), Max("value") FROM /^$Measurement$/ WHERE ("status" = '202' OR "status" = '200' OR "status" = '204') AND $timeFilter GROUP BY "name","method"

SELECT 
  count("value"), 
  percentile("value", 50), 
  percentile("value", 80), 
  percentile("value", 90), 
  percentile("value", 95), 
  min("value"), 
  mean("value"), 
  max("value") 
FROM "ws_duration" 
WHERE $timeFilter 
GROUP BY "name", "method"

spec.title: K6_Load_Testing_Metrics_Dashboard_05
